events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position early this morning, highlighting strong experience in backend development.
The recruitment team classified the application under Engineering due to the candidate's developer background and relevant software skills.
Assigned recruiter reached out to the candidate to acknowledge receipt and schedule an initial screening for the software engineer role.
Conducted a productive initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated clear knowledge of devops practices and software development lifecycles.
Candidate responded promptly with availability for the next stage, expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview scheduled for next week with the engineering team to assess coding and system design skills in depth.
